forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain likely. Mostly cloudy. High near 58, with temperatures falling to around 56 in the afternoon. South southeast wind 14 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 33 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain. Cloudy. Low around 52, with temperatures rising to around 54 overnight. South southeast wind 17 to 31 mph, with gusts as high as 55 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New rainfall amounts between three quarters and one inch possible.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco today, the atmosphere is heavy with the promise of rain, thick clouds cloaking the city in a muted embrace. As the afternoon unfolds, the temperature gently retreats, nudging towards a cool 56. The swirling winds, whispering from the southeast, gather strength, sending gusts that surge up to 33 mph, carrying with them the scents of the impending rain. The sky, a palette of slate gray, seems to hang low, shrouded in a veil that speaks of the moisture soon to drench the streets. With a 70% chance of rain, the city prevails under the spell of a damp chill, making the world outside feel much cozier when viewed from a warm window seat.

As night descends, the rain will intensify, with a certainty that reaches 100%—a symphony of droplets serenading the dimly lit city. The temperature will hover around 52, gradually climbing to 54, while the winds exacerbate their fury, gusting up to 55 mph. The heavy clouds will bring new rainfall, possibly accumulating to an inch, wrapping the urban landscape in a saturated silence. As you step out into this evening—perhaps for a quiet stroll down Van Ness or a steaming cup of coffee at a neighborhood café—layering up with a sturdy jacket and comfortable shoes is advisable, allowing you to weave through the dampness with a sense of ease. The streets may burn with reflections, their sheen mirroring the shimmering city lights, transforming a routine walk into a charming exploration of San Francisco's vibrant heart on a rainy evening.
